name: Faster Asteroids
description:
"Faster, I said, FASTER!"
"But, Captain, there are asteroids ahead!"
"I did not ask about your opinion, Pilot. Now go!"

Navigate a spaceship ship (your mouse cursor) through a field of asteroids.. safely. And, hopefully do it quickly, otherwise the captain might be mad at you.

Created in roughly 2 hours for TriJam 48.
